Events and Resources

Marriott 35th from CMN Hospitals on Vimeo.

Extra Life is a fundraising program for the gaming community. Participants fundraise year-round and pledge to game for 24-hours with one goal in mind: to save and improve the lives of sick and injured kids. Click here to sign up.

The Torch Relay for Children's Miracle Network Hospitals is a unique multi-day event where participants can walk or run a segment of The Torch Relay at events throughout the country to raise money for their local CMN Hospital. Click here to learn more.

We are thrilled to announce the expansion of the partnership between Kendra Scott & Marriott International in order to benefit Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals. Through Kendra Gives Back initiative, Kendra Scott representatives enjoy hosting a variety of unique events where 20% of the proceeds benefit your local children’s hospital.

Where does the money raised at my property go?

Ninety percent of people who donate to charitable organizations want to know that their donations help support a local cause. You are encouraged to let associates and guests know exactly which children’s hospital your property is supporting. To locate your member hospital visit Children's Miracle Network Hospital Search. Each hospital decides exactly how to use the donated funds based on what they need most.
